text: Willi "Ille" Gerdau (February 12, 1929 in Heide â€“ February 11, 2011 in Uetersen) was a German footballer. Gerdau was a midfielder, who played for Heider SV. He participated in the 1956 Summer Olympics in Australia, and also in the national football team of West Germany in 1957. Willi Gerdau died the day before his 82th birthday. == References == * www.worldfootball.net Category:1929 births Category:2011 deaths Category:German footballers Category:Olympians for Germany Category:Sportspeople from Schleswig-Holstein
title: Willi Gerdau
